lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Ryan Met/Adam Met/Jack Met
[00:00.010] 作曲 : Ryan Met/Adam Met/Jack Met
[00:00.20]Used to keep it cool
[00:01.64]Used to be a fool
[00:02.86]All about the bounce in my step
[00:05.45]Watch it on the news
[00:06.85]Whatcha gonna do?
[00:08.11]I could hit refresh and forget
[00:10.77]Used to keep it cool
[00:21.41]Should I keep it light?
[00:22.46]Stay out of the fight?
[00:23.70]No one’s gonna listen to me
[00:26.35]If I write a song
[00:27.66]Preaching what is wrong
[00:28.96]Will they let me sing on TV?
[00:31.56]Should I keep it light?
[00:37.05]Is that right?
[00:42.75](Is that right?)
[00:43.62]Way up way up we go
[00:45.74]Been up and down that road
[00:48.34]Way up way up, oh no
[00:50.92]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[00:53.50]Watch me stand in the line
[00:56.06]You’re only serving lies
[00:58.69]You’ve got something to hide
[01:01.42]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[01:11.65]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[01:18.05]Yeah
[01:18.87]Used to let it go
[01:19.92]Walk into the show
[01:21.19]Gawking at the tricks up your sleeve
[01:23.76]Too good to be true
[01:25.11]But I’m in a room
[01:26.49]Full of entertainers and thieves
[01:29.00]Used to let it go
[01:34.57]Woah, oh no
[01:38.95](Whoa, oh no)
[01:40.66]Way up way up we go
[01:43.13]Been up and down that road
[01:45.72]Way up way up, oh no
[01:48.26]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[01:51.17]Watch me stand in the line
[01:53.56]You’re only serving lies
[01:56.13]You’ve got something to hide
[01:58.57]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[02:10.12]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[02:17.39](We gon’ burn the whole house down)
[02:22.44]Should I hang my head low?
[02:24.91]Should I bite my tongue?
[02:27.17]Or should I march with every stranger from Twitter to get s*** done?
[02:32.79]Used to hang my head low
[02:35.26]Now I hear it loud
[02:37.80]Every stranger from Twitter is gonna burn this down
[02:44.32]Way up way up we go
[02:46.62]Been up and down that road
[02:49.23]Way up way up, oh no
[02:51.79]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[02:54.49]Watch me stand in the line, (whoa oh)
[02:57.08]You’re only serving lies, (yeah)
[02:59.59]You’ve got something to hide
[03:02.04]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[03:07.46]Whoa oh, yeah
[03:12.32]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[03:16.41]We burn it down, we burn it down
[03:22.80]We gon’ burn the whole house down
[03:25.99]
